value:
What kind of relationship exists
between bunnies and spring magic?
Seems a bit of a rabbit hole...

Alm told me I can turn to him if I have
anything I need to talk about. I don't
know what he means, but nice, right?

I've been hearing murmurs that the
world will come to an end if these
eggs aren't watched with utmost care.$k$pIs that true?

I am not "frolicking." I'm seeking out
spring magics. I won't reduce my
enthusiasm on your account.

If Delthea sees me in this outfit, she'll
tease me for the next three years...
She absolutely must not witness this.

This outfit? It is the mark of one
who is investigating the magics of
spring—for $Nf!

Perhaps there is something to be
enjoyed on a spring day like this...
Er, don't listen in on my private talk!

I think you can see that I am
quite serious.

I was distracted worrying over what
could be hidden within the eggs...

A new power?! Is this the magic
of the spring season that I've
been seeking?!

I'm Luthier. I am here in search of
seasonal spring magic. This outfit
is part of— Don't laugh at me!

So, is it true that if I dress like this,
I will grasp the secrets of seasonal
spring magic?!$k$pIt's possible this sort of magic comes
as second nature to me...$k$pPeople have been much more
drawn to me here... They keep
calling out and stopping to talk.$k$pHm. Perhaps I have made a few new
acquaintances... I imagine the festival
atmosphere helped matters as well...$k$pIt is possible that some of them may
even become my friends... Maybe...$k$p...What are you grinning about?!
You're incorrigible.$k$pDespite my struggles with the
seasonal spring magic, I have
enjoyed my time... So, thanks.
それっ
どうだ！
うわっ
おのれ…
A bit of seasonal magic!
Why don't you take a nap?
A vernal explosion!
The hopping shall commence!
The nature of merriment...
ん？
So wearing bunny ears in spring is a cultural custom in Askr. Fascinating.
Watch where you're going! You nearly made me drop my egg...
Something about warm and peaceful weather puts me in the mood to nap.
While I prefer to remain indoors, I see now that festivals can be as engaging as research.
Does our spending time together here mean that we've become...friends?
If Delthea saw me in this outfit, I'm certain I would scarcely hear the end of it.
My research during this festival has bloomed vibrantly. I owe you my thanks.
I will handle it.
Feeling lethargic?
Spring has sprung!
